TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FilterUIHintAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class FilterUIHintAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class FilterUIHintAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 열에 대해 필터링 동작을 지정하는 데 사용되는 특성을 나타냅니다.

span.span: Represents an attribute that is used to specify the filtering behavior for a column.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 예의 product 엔터티에 대해 기본 필터를 대체 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following example shows how to replace default filters on the product entity. ```csharp MetadataType(typeof(Product_MD))] public partial class Product { private class Product_MD { [FilterUIHint("MultiForeignKey")] public object Category { get; set; } [FilterUIHint("BooleanRadio")] public object Discontinued { get; set; } } } ``` ```vb _ Public Class Product Private Class Product_MD _ Public Property Category As Object End Property _ Public Property Discontinued As Object End Property End Class End Class ```

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string filterUIHint) cil managed
Public Sub New (filterUIHint As String)
public: FilterUIHintAttribute(System::String ^ filterUIHint);

span.span: The name of the control to use for filtering.

summary.span: 필터 UI 힌트를 사용하여 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the filter UI hint.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 예의 product 엔터티에 대해 기본 필터를 대체 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following example shows how to replace default filters on the product entity. ```csharp MetadataType(typeof(Product_MD))] public partial class Product { private class Product_MD { [FilterUIHint("MultiForeignKey")] public object Category { get; set; } [FilterUIHint("BooleanRadio")] public object Discontinued { get; set; } } } ``` ```vb _ Public Class Product Private Class Product_MD _ Public Property Category As Object End Property _ Public Property Discontinued As Object End Property End Class End Class ```
